@i_am_sid: NLE of any kind is not possible with Matroska, without full re-encoding. Sorry. What could be done is cutting to some frame, cutting same mkv From nearby frame then saving such cut-portions as mky then Appending them one to each other.
Biutiful  and Beautiful are quite different, right?
Simpler: Get newest mkvtoolnix from bunkus.org site. Run mmg. Google.
